lines.text: Old buddy, the brakes are gone!
I'm fine, but the seat covers are ruined!
You know, it's - it's the desert air that does it.
Dries out your brain juice so you can't think straight no more. Happens t'everybody out here.
Uh! Sure hope them boys can fly better'n they can drive.
Again. Punch it in again. And make sure.
I tried three times, Harry. I keep on getting the same answer. These are all designated landing areas.
Oh my God, they're coming back!
Well, as long as Hangar 18 exists, the problem exists.
There are airplane crashes every day. Even at military bases.
George, could we have this tape, or a copy?
This is a Department of Defense operation. You guys couldn't get outta here with a coffee cup.
